subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The Nets’ young players are showing the strain of the realization that unless the team wins on Wednesday, it will set an N.B.A. record for the worst start to a season.
snippet: The Nets’ young players are showing the strain of the realization that unless the team wins on Wednesday, it will set an N.B.A. record for the worst start to a season.
